name: Cotogna's Crystal Beach
description: This rye-based cocktail from Cotogna restaurant in San Francisco tastes super-fresh thanks to lemon juice, berry liqueur, and a bunch of aromatic basil.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces rye whiskey, such as Rittenhouse 100 proof
1 ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice (from 1 lemon)
2 ounces ginger beer, such as Blenheim's

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly muddle basil leaves in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Add rye, lemon, and Goji liqueur. Fill shaker with ice and shake until well chilled.
Fill a collins glass with ice. Double-strain into serving glass. Top with ginger beer and garnish with basil sprig.
